name: One Hundred Asteroids
description:
One hundred Asteroids is a 64 x 64 pixels shoot em up, where you try to destroy  one hundred asteroids, created in 2 days for the LowResJam 2020.

Controls:

  • Movement: Arrow keys
  • Shoot: Space bar 

Atributions:

Rsilveira_88 - Sound Effect (Synthesized explosion)

Aeross - Sound Effect (Zap)

Apollo Produced It - Music (Lonely Nights)
